item.title: Report X-2024072232
item.description:
Report X-2024072232

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-05T15:15:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-26
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg shipped as fully regulated with only Ltd Qty diamond printed on outer carton. Pkg missing required Hazmat Certification and OP-900LL tear-away Hazmat tags. Pkg was dropped causing the side of 1 x 1 gal. plastic bottle to split approximately 4" on the side allowing the liquid to leak wetting and contaminating the contents and carton causing the carton to rip and contents to fall out.

item.title: Report X-2024071673
item.description:
Report X-2024071673

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-30T12:20:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-18
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg flagged for Hazmat Acceptance Process (HAP) and removed form system flow. Pkg has no Hazmat diamonds or markings other than the OP-900LL Hazmat tera-away tags. Pkg missing required Hazmat Certification and OP-900LL Hazmat tags are unusable as substitute Certification. Inspection of pkg found concealed damage to 1 x 30 lbs. gas cylinder. Carrying handles are crushed/bent due to inadequate packing material and orientation of contents in the pkg.

item.title: Report X-2024071517
item.description:
Report X-2024071517

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-30T12:20:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-12
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package is a case of four 1-gallon bottles decalcifier for histology use. Has loose caps, experienced compression/crushing, leaked. Caps not secured w/ tape or by other means. Liquids not bagged to prevent release. Relatively tall container unlikely to remain upright during transport and sort.
